About Me

I am a software engineer and applied mathematician with a skillset well-suited to tackling complex problems spanning multiple domains. My interests lie in the cross-section of mathematics, statistics, computer science, neuroscience, and linguistics. In particular, I seek to develop statistical and computational models having wide-ranging impact across fields such as machine learning, natural language processing, and theoretical neuroscience.
